title: What are advantages and disadvantages of online learning?

korean: 온라인 수업의 가장 큰 장점은 역시 시간과 장소의 자유예요.
어디서든 인터넷만 되면 수업을 들을 수 있잖아요.
카페에서 듣든, 집에서 듣든, 심지어 여행 가서도 가능하고.
강의실 임대료 같은 게 안 들어가니까 그런 것 같고요.
반복 학습이 가능한 것도 큰 장점이에요.
단점은 역시 집중력 유지가 어렵다는 거죠.
주변에 유혹이 너무 많고, 스스로 관리해야 하니까.
화상으로 하는 게 대면으로 하는 것만큼 자연스럽지 않거든요.
인터넷 연결이 안 좋으면 수업이 중단되는 것도 문제고.
그래도 코로나 이후로는 온라인 수업이 필수가 된 것 같아요.
english: The biggest advantage of online classes is definitely the freedom of time and place.
You can take classes anywhere as long as you have internet, right?
Whether it's at a cafe, at home, or even when you're traveling.
The cost is often cheaper than offline classes too.
I think it's because they don't have to pay for classroom rentals and stuff.
Being able to study repeatedly is also a big advantage.
The disadvantage is that it's hard to maintain concentration.
There are too many distractions around you, and you have to manage yourself.
Asking questions or having discussions feels a bit awkward too.
Doing it over video isn't as natural as doing it face-to-face, you know.
It's also a problem when the internet connection is bad and the class gets interrupted.
But after COVID, I think online classes have become essential.
